caseTitle: Syed Asghar Ali Shah v. Kaleem Arshad and others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Proviso to clause (2) does not apply to clause (3) of Article 212. Appeals against orders of the Provincial Administrative Tribunals are competent before the Supreme Court under Article 212(3). Gomal Medical College v. Armaghan Khan (PLD 2023 SC 190) overruled.
